message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but we both get something
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money.
Come on, meet me in the middle, I'm being more generous this time
Okay, let's split this evenly.  50/50.  It's the fairest and fastest way to end this.
You went down to 50, I'll meet you a bit closer, but I still think I deserve more
This is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a small hit to end this now. Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, I can see that. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but don't expect me to go much lower
This is my final offer.  We're running out of time, and I'm willing to lose a bit more to get this done.  Don't be greedy.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll give you one more chance to accept a reasonable split
